item.title: Access Web Interface
item.description: Here is a simple yet useful trick to access web interface within your cluster. As stated in the Kubernetes documentation you can use kubectl proxy. I’ve seen a lot of people using the proxy to access the dashboard but you can use it to access any web interfaces, without the need to create an ingress and protect it. http://kubernetes_master_address/api/v1/namespaces/namespace_name/services/service_name[:port_name]/proxy For example here is how to access the Traefik dashboard described as follow:
